title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with a focus on traffic lights and pedestrians.
caption: A white car drives down a city street with a red car and a bus behind it.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNoon). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 0.7 m/s). There are 16 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The white car is driving down a city street with a red car and a bus behind it. There are several traffic lights and pedestrians on the sidewalk. The road is wet and there are tall buildings in the background.
reasoning: The white car is driving down the city street and is about to pass a red car and a bus. It slows down as it approaches a traffic light and a pedestrian crossing. The driver is cautious and maintains a safe distance from the other vehicles on the road. The tall buildings in the background suggest that this is a busy urban area with heavy traffic.
